item.description:
The third HSLMG lunch will be at Monte Alban at 12:00 on Thursday September 27. The first two were a lot of fun, with good conversation and good food.

Everyone with an interest in Spanish is welcome, from native speakers to those just beginning to learn the language. My experience is that the HSLMG is a very welcoming group!

Here is a link to a review of the Monte Alban, a small, family run resturant with authentic Mexican food:
MonteAlban

I'm going to suggest we do as we did at the last almuerzo: order shortly after 12:00 and ask for individual checks so people can leave on their own schedule. If you arrive after noon, that's OK too, since I'm sure the lunch will continue on for awhile!

Hope to see a bunch of Meetup members there!

Saludos,
Dan

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Tercer Almuerzo
